name: Flight of the Night
description:
Originally created December 5-8th 2014 for the Ludum Dare 31.

Flight of the Night is a horror platformer in which you are trapped in a nightmare and must traverse randomly generated terrain to escape a looming threat. During the game, you will need to collect light or it may become too dark to see. You will also fight off monsters impeding your progress.

The game was created in 72 hours and is both terrible and unfinished. It was my second ever game jam.

Programming - @smol_jordan
